data.title: Fraunces Tavern
data.text:
Our Menu

Every Day, from 4:00 pm

Desserts

Sticky Toffee Pudding

$14

dulce de leche ice cream

Yuzu Cheesecake

$14

vanilla bean whipped cream, chocolate soil

Warmed Chocolate Chip Brownie

$12

vanilla bean whipped cream, strawberry

Raw Oysters

Chef ’s Daily Selection

$20/Half Dozen

$38/Dozen

Please ask your server, served with a classic mignonette sauce.

* Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness.

Appetizers

New England Clam Chowder

$14

served with house-made bread

Grilled Octopus

$26

chorizo, roasted fingerlings, grilled pineapple, shishito peppers, spicy bourbon honey

$22

avocado purée, frizzled onions

Scotch Egg

$16

Our signature three sausage blend, porter cheddar, dirty mustard, spicy bourbon honey

Salads

$18

$16
